statements: UPDATE customer_preferences SET email='newemail@example.com', preference_1='new preference' WHERE customer_id=123;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET last_name='Doe', first_name='Jane' WHERE customer_id=456;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_1 = 'New Preference 1', preference_2 = 'New Preference 2' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_value='new_value' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET campaign_description='Updated description', campaign_start_date='2023-01-01' WHERE campaign_id=3;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE customer_id = 123 AND email = 'customer@example.com' AND preference_type = 'Category'
UPDATE email_campaigns SET campaign_description = 'New Description', campaign_start_date = '2023-01-01', campaign_end_date = '2023-02-28' WHERE campaign_id = 456
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET budget = 5000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET email_address = 'new_email@example.com', preferences = '{"theme":"dark","language":"en"}' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE campaigns SET budget = 15000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 201;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET preference_1 = 'New Preference' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE customers SET country = 'USA' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'new_value' WHERE preference_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value='new_value' WHERE customer_id=5 AND preference_name='notification_preference';
